document.full_text: mr. garfinkel, whose theories espoused the mind-sets and behaviorial patterns of jurors, was affiliated with the sociology department at u.c.l.a. for more than 50 years.
document.title: harold garfinkel, a common-sense sociologist, dies at 93
lines_and_colors: mr. garfinkel, whose theories espoused the mind-sets and behaviorial patterns of jurors, was affiliated with the sociology department at u.c.l.a. for more than 50 years.
